# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main image shows two distinct structures:

## Structure 1 (Left): Tower
- Total blocks: 7 blocks
- Layers: 5 layers
- Spatial arrangement:
  - Bottom layer: Two red arch blocks side by side
  - Second layer: One yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across both arches
  - Third layer: One green cube and one blue cube side by side on the yellow block
  - Fourth layer: One red block with an archway (tunnel-like opening)
  - Top layer: One orange triangular/roof-shaped block

## Structure 2 (Right): Table
- Total blocks: 3 blocks
- Layers: 2 layers
- Spatial arrangement:
  - Bottom layer: Two orange cylindrical blocks as legs
  - Top layer: One green rectangular block placed horizontally on top

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Tower):
- Two red arch blocks (indices 1 and 2)
- One yellow rectangular block (index 12)
- One blue cube (index 6)
- One green cube (index 7)
- One red block with archway (index 3)
- One orange triangular/roof block (index 16)

For Structure 2 (Table):
- Two orange cylindrical blocks (index 13)
- One green rectangular block (index 11)

# Assembly Order

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 1
  Step2: Move block with index 2
  Step3: Move block with index 12
  Step4: Move block with index 6
  Step5: Move block with index 7
```
